# mediaSearch

**Instance Property**

The type of item to search for.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var mediaSearch: INMediaSearch? { get }
```

## Discussion

Depending on the user’s request, you may need to search for a particular media item. For example, adding a specific song would set `mediaSearch` to [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INMediaSearch/mediaName] to “name” and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INMediaSearch/mediaType] to [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INMediaItemType/song].

## Getting the Media Information

- **affinityType**: The user’s affinity for the media item.
- **INMediaAffinityType**: Constants that describe a user’s affinity for a media item.
- **mediaItems**: The media items to update.
